content: shirley is made for the bamcal 2025 and is a 10 inch square made with stylecraft special double knit and a 4mm hook you can follow a 2 3 5 or 7 colour scheme these are listed in the separate pdf as well as the yarn amounts used per round there are also instructions for if you want to use just one colour if you want to use aran/worsted weight yarn with hook size 5mm it will give you a 12 inch square have fun making the square
